# Kiswarani

Kiswarani (Aymara kiswara Buddleja incana, -ni a suffix to indicate ownership, "the one with kiswara", hispanicized spelling Quishuarani) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru, about  high. It is located in the Apur√≠mac Region, Antabamba Province, Sabaino District, and in the Aymaraes Province, Caraybamba District. Kiswarani lies southeast of Pisti.
